verses.text_uthmani: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13032'>قْ</tajweed>تَرَبَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13033'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13034'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13034'>نش</tajweed>َقَّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13035'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iqtarabatis-sā'atu wansyaqqal-qamar(u).
verses.translation: Вот Час настал, И раскололся месяц

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3990'>ِن ي</tajweed>َرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13036'>ةً ي</tajweed>ُعْرِضُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَيَقُولُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> سِحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13037'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iy yarau āyatay yu'riḍū wa yaqūlū siḥrum mustamirr(un).
verses.translation: Но даже если их глазам Предстанет ясное знамение (Аллаха), Они отворотятся от него и скажут: "Это - всего лишь колдовство

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2433'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَهْو<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمْ‌ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13038'>رٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa każżabū wattaba'ū ahwā'ahum wa kullu amrim mustaqirr(un).
verses.translation: И ложью нарекли они (предупрежденье) И предались своим страстям, Не зная то, что всяко дело Назначенный черед имеет

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13039'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13040'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13041'>نۢب</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad jā'ahum minal-ambā'i mā fīhi muzdajar(un).
verses.translation: И к ним, поистине, уже пришли рассказы, В которых им предупрежденья были, Чтоб удержать их (от греха)

verses.text_uthmani: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حِكْمَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13042'>ةُۢ ب</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِغَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13043'>ةٌ‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َمَا تُغْنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13044'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُذُرُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥikmatum bāligatun famā tugnin-nużur(u).
verses.translation: То - мудрость ясная, и все ж Предупрежденья эти им не в помощь

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ‌ۘ يَوْمَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9312'>دْ</tajweed>عُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13045'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دَّاعِ إِلَىٰ ش<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13046'>َىْءٍ ن</tajweed>ُّكُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa tawalla 'anhum, yauma yad'ud-dā'i ilā syai'in nukur(in).
verses.translation: А потому, (о Мухаммад!), уйди от них. В тот День, Когда Зовущий (ангел) Их призовет к ужасному (Суду)

verses.text_uthmani: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خُشَّعًا أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4718'>بْ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11261'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11262'>جْ</tajweed>دَاثِ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ جَرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13047'>دٌ م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13048'>نت</tajweed>َشِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Khusysya'an abṣāruhum yakhrujūna minal-ajdāṡi ka'annahum jarādum muntasyir(un).
verses.translation: Они с поникшими глазами выйдут из могил, Рассеявшейся саранче подобны

verses.text_uthmani: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13049'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دَّاعِ‌ۖ يَقُولُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13050'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرُونَ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Muhṭi'īna ilad-dā'(i), yaqūlul-kāfirūna hāżā yaumun 'asir(un).
verses.translation: И, устремясь к Зовущему, неверные воскликнут: "О, как же тяжек этот День

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8394'>بْ</tajweed>لَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13051'>حٍ ف</tajweed>َكَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11499'>بْ</tajweed>دَنَا وَقَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12342'>جْ</tajweed>نُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13052'>نٌ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13053'>ٱ</tajweed>زْدُجِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Każżabat qablahum qaumu nūḥin fakażżabū 'abdanā wa qālū majnūnuw wazdujir(a).
verses.translation: Еще до них отвергли (Истину Господню) люди Нуха И объявили Нашего слугу лжецом. "Вот одержимый", - молвили они, И был он изгнан ими

verses.text_uthmani: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مَغْلُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13054'>بٌ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13055'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13055'>نت</tajweed>َصِرْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa da'ā rabbahū annī maglūbun fantaṣir.
verses.translation: Тогда к Владыке своему он обратился: "Я побежден! Приди на помощь мне

verses.text_uthmani: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَفَتَحْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4047'>بْ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>بَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13056'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ بِم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13057'>ءٍ م</tajweed>ُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa fataḥnā abwābas-samā'i bimā'im munhamir(in).
verses.translation: Мы распахнули врата неба, Потоки вод с него извергнув

verses.text_uthmani: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَجَّرْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13058'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ عُيُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13059'>نًا ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13060'>ٱ</tajweed>لْتَقَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13061'>ٱ</tajweed>لْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَمْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13062'>رٍ ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> قُدِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa fajjarnal-arḍa 'uyūnan faltaqal-mā'u 'alā amrin qad qudir(a).
verses.translation: Затем Мы рассекли источниками землю, И встретилась вода (небес) с (земной) водою, Как было (Господом) повелено и решено

verses.text_uthmani: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحَمَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13063'>حٍ و</tajweed>َدُسُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ḥamalnāhu 'alā żāti alwāḥiw wa dusur(in).
verses.translation: И понесли его Мы (на ковчеге), Построенном из досок и штырей

verses.text_uthmani: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':120'>جْ</tajweed>رِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13064'>ءً ل</tajweed>ِّمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':10739'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ كُفِرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tajrī bi'a'yuninā, jazā'al liman kāna kufir(a).
verses.translation: Чтоб плыл он (под охраной) Наших глаз Как воздаяние тому, кого они отвергли

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':13065'>د</tajweed> تَّرَكْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَايَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13066'>ةً ف</tajweed>َهَلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13067'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqat taraknāhā āyatan fahal mim muddakir(in).
verses.translation: И Мы оставили знамением его. Но есть ли хоть один (из вас), Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa kaifa kāna 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: Каким же (страшным) было наказание Мое! И каково Мое предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> يَسَّرْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13068'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13067'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
verses.translation: Поистине, Мы сделали Коран Понятным для запоминанья, Но есть ли хоть один (из вас), Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذَّبَتْ عَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13069'>دٌ ف</tajweed>َكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Każżabat 'ādun fa kaifa kāna 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: И люди Ад сочли лжецом (пророка Худа). Каким же (страшным) было наказание Мое! И каково Мое предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11982'>حًا ص</tajweed>َرْصَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11983'>رًا ف</tajweed>ِى يَوْمِ نَحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13070'>سٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā arsalnā 'alaihim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī yaumi naḥsim mustamirr(in).
verses.translation: Мы в этот долгий День Злосчастья Обрушили на них свирепый ветер

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13071'>نز</tajweed>ِعُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13072'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسَ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13073'>لٍ م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13074'>نق</tajweed>َعِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tanzi'un-nās(a), ka'annahum a'jāzu nakhlim munqa'ir(in).
verses.translation: Что вырывал людей из их домов, Подобно пальмам - с корнем (из земли)

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa kaifa kāna 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: Каким же (страшным) было наказание Мое! И каково Мое предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> يَسَّرْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13068'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13067'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّدَّكِرٍ

verses.translation: Поистине, мы сделали Коран Понятным для запоминанья, Но есть ли хоть один (из вас), Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13075'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Każżabat ṡamūdu bin-nużur(i).
verses.translation: И самудяне тоже ложью (нарекли) увещевания (пророка)

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa qālū abasyaram minnā wāḥidan nattabi'uh(ū), innā iżal lafī ḍalāliw wa su'ur(in).
verses.translation: Сказав: "Ужель пойдем мы за одним из нас, Обычным (смертным) человеком? Ведь, право, в случае таком Мы в заблуждение впадем, и ум наш помутнеет

verses.text_uthmani: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَءُلْقِىَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13079'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':4086'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: A'ulqiyaż-żikru 'alaihi mim baininā bal huwa każżābun asyir(un).
verses.translation: Ужель послание (Господне) дано из всех нас лишь ему? Он - наглый лжец, и только

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13080'>دًا م</tajweed>َّنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13081'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَذَّابُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13082'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَشِرُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Saya'lamūna gadam manil-każżābul-asyir(u).
verses.translation: Ну что ж! Они узнают завтра, Кто наглый лжец

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مُرْسِلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13083'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاقَةِ فِتْنَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13084'>ةً ل</tajweed>َّهُمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13085'>ٱ</tajweed>رْتَقِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13085'>بْ</tajweed>هُمْ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8381'>ٱ</tajweed>صْطَبِرْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā mursilun-nāqati fitnatal lahum fartaqibhum waṣṭabir.
verses.translation: Мы им пошлем верблюдицу для испытанья, А ты следи за ними и терпи

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13086'>ٱ</tajweed>لْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ قِسْمَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13087'>ةُۢ ب</tajweed>َيْنَهُمْ‌ۖ كُلُّ شِرْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13088'>بٍ م</tajweed>ُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa nabbi'hum annal-mā'a qismatum bainahum, kullu syirbim muḥtaḍar(un).
verses.translation: И сообщи им, что вода поделена меж ними И каждому назначен свой черед (испить)

verses.text_uthmani: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَنَادَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa nādau ṣāḥibahum fa ta'āṭā fa 'aqar(a).
verses.translation: Они ж воззвали к своему собрату, Кто (саблю) вынул и убил (ее)

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fakaifa kāna 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: Каким же (страшным) было наказание Мое! И каково Мое предупрежденье

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā arsalnā 'alaihim ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa kānū kahasyīmil-muḥtaẓir(i).
verses.translation: И Мы послали против них один лишь вопль, И они стали словно хворост, Что для оград использует (пастух)

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
verses.translation: Поистине, мы сделали Коран Понятным для запоминанья, Но есть ли хоть один (из вас), Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُو<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13091'>طِۭ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13075'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Każżabat qaumu lūṭim bin-nużur(i).
verses.translation: И люди Лута тоже ложью (нарекли) увещевания (пророка)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَالَ لُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13092'>طٍ‌ۖ ن</tajweed>َّجَّيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13093'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِسَحَرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā arsalnā 'alaihim ḥāṣiban illā āla lūṭ(in), najjaināhum bisaḥar(in).
verses.translation: Мы против них послали ураган, несущий камни, (Что уничтожил всех), кроме семейства Лута, Спасенного на утренней заре

verses.text_uthmani: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نِّعْمَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13094'>ةً م</tajweed>ِّنْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6142'>ند</tajweed>ِنَا‌ۚ كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4214'>جْ</tajweed>زِى مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13095'>ن ش</tajweed>َكَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ni'matam min 'indinā, każālika najzī man syakar(a).
verses.translation: По милости от Нас, - Так воздаем Мы тем, кто благодарен

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13096'>نذ</tajweed>َرَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13097'>ُم ب</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13098'>طْ</tajweed>شَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13075'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad anżarahum baṭsyatanā fa tamārau bin-nużur(i).
verses.translation: Поистине, их (Лут) предупреждал О мощи Нашей хватки; Они же спор затеяли об этом

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>وَدُوهُ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13099'>ن ض</tajweed>َيْفِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَطَمَسْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad rāwadūhu 'an ḍaifihī fa ṭamasnā a'yunahum fa żūqū 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: Пытаясь за собой увлечь его гостей. Мы зрения лишили их, (и им звучало): "Теперь познайте вкус Моих угроз и увещаний

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> صَبَّحَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13100'>ُم ب</tajweed>ُكْرَةً عَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13101'>بٌ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ṣabbaḥahum bukratan 'ażābum mustaqirr(un).
verses.translation: А ранним утром их, поистине, настигли (Обещанные Мною) нескончаемые муки

verses.text_uthmani: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذُوقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa żūqū 'ażābī wa nużur(i).
verses.translation: Познайте вкус Моих угроз и увещаний

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> يَسَّرْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13068'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13067'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
verses.translation: Поистине, Мы сделали Коран Понятным для запоминанья, Но есть ли хоть один (из вас), Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13102'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُذُرُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad jā'a āla fir'aunan-nużur(u).
verses.translation: Ведь, истинно, предупреждения (Господни) К народу Фараона приходили

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13103'>زٍ م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13104'>قْ</tajweed>تَدِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Każżabū bi'āyātinā kullihā fa'akhażnāhum akhża 'azīzim muqtadir(in).
verses.translation: Они же все знаменья Наши ложью нарекли; Тогда Мы их схватили хваткою такой, (Какою может обладать лишь Тот), Кто всемогущ над всем и волен над всея

verses.text_uthmani: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1231'>رٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْ أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكُمْ أَمْ لَك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13105'>ُم ب</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13106'>ةٌ ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13107'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زُّبُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Akuffārukum khairum min ulā'ikum am lakum barā'atun fiz-zubur(i).
verses.translation: Ужель неправедные ваши лучше, чем они? Или в Святых Писаниях для вас Есть грамота охранная (от наказанья)

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13108'>عٌ م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13109'>نت</tajweed>َصِرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am yaqūlūna naḥnu jamī'um muntaṣir(un).
verses.translation: Иль они скажут: "Нас так много, Что мы друг друга сможем защитить И одержать победу

verses.text_uthmani: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَيُهْزَمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13110'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13111'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّبُرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Sayuhzamul-jam'u wa yuwallūnad-dubur(a).
verses.translation: Но скоро это множество (людей) В такое бегство обратится, Что будут видны лишь их спины

verses.text_uthmani: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13112'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12438'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13113'>دْ</tajweed>هَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Balis-sā'atu mau'iduhum was-sā'atu adhā wa amarr(u).
verses.translation: И станет этот Час Тем Часом, что им был обещан, И будет он (для них) Неизмеримо горьким и печальным

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12309'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4093'>جْ</tajweed>رِمِينَ فِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13078'>لٍ و</tajweed>َسُعُرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-mujrimīna fī ḍalāliw wa su'ur(in).
verses.translation: Все грешники, поистине, в безумии блуждают

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4674'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yusḥabūna fin-nāri 'alā wujūhihim, żūqū massa saqar(a).
verses.translation: В тот День Их по всему лицу протащат в огнь (Ада): "Вкусите же прикосновенье Ада

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7232'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā kulla syai'in khalaqnāhu biqadar(in).
verses.translation: Поистине, Мы в должной мере Сотворили всяку вещь

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْرُن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَّا و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13114'>ةٌ ك</tajweed>َلَمْ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13115'>حِۭ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13116'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَصَرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥim bil-baṣar(i).
verses.translation: И Наш приказ- один (лишь акт свершенья) Длиной в одно мгновенье ока

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَهْلَكْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13067'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ahlaknā asy-yā'akum fahal mim muddakir(in).
verses.translation: Мы в прошлом погубили многих вам подобных, - Но есть ли хоть один из вас, Кто это увещание приемлет

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكُلُّ ش<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13117'>َىْءٍ ف</tajweed>َعَلُوهُ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13107'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زُّبُرِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kullu syai'in fa'alūhu fiz-zubur(i).
verses.translation: Все, что ни делают они, Занесено в их книги

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكُلُّ صَغِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13118'>رٍ و</tajweed>َكَبِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13119'>رٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kullu ṣagīriw wa kabīrim mustaṭar(un).
verses.translation: Где запись всех - и малых, и великих - дел

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa nahar(in).
verses.translation: А праведникам - пребывать в Садах, средь рек

verses.text_uthmani: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ

verses.translation: Где Истина живет, Присутствием могучего Владыки (освещена)
